channel.title: Need help creating my client files into one file for others to use, like .jar
channel.description: i downloaded a client with all the file (spirites, etc.) and i wanted to make it into one file , like another server would have a .jar file that would run the client to log in. how would i do that? i searched but the search bar isn't so accurate, and if theres a tut just paste the link :)

item.title: Need help creating my client files into one file for others to use, like .jar
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

JDK has a jar creating utility right in it. After all a jar is just a zip file with text-instructions (manifest) for the JRE.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help creating my client files into one file for others to use, like .jar

item.title: Need help creating my client files into one file for others to use, like .jar
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

Most people make them to .zip but .jar can be uploaded and used right after download so it’s kinda better. Look up how to use JAR Maker on youtube. It’s very easy. Good luck with your server. PS I just now did that today.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help creating my client files into one file for others to use, like .jar
